entities.name: monsieur delacour
entities.description: Monsieur Delacour is described as walking up the aisle with Fleur, bouncing and beaming. He is a person who is part of the wedding ceremony.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is described as gliding up the aisle, wearing a simple white dress and emitting a strong silvery glow. She is a person who is part of the wedding ceremony.

entities.name: ginnys
entities.description: Ginny and Gabrielle are described as wearing golden dresses, looking prettier than usual when Fleur's radiance falls upon them. They are people who are part of the wedding ceremony.

entities.name: gabrielle
entities.description: Ginny and Gabrielle are described as wearing golden dresses, looking prettier than usual when Fleur's radiance falls upon them. They are people who are part of the wedding ceremony.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is described as not looking like he had ever met Fenrir Greyback when Fleur reaches him. He is a person who is part of the wedding ceremony.

entities.name: fenrir greyback
entities.description: Fenrir Greyback is mentioned as someone Bill has never met, implying he is an important or notable figure. He is a person who is not part of the wedding ceremony.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as seeing the small, tufty-haired wizard standing in front of Bill and Fleur. He is a person who is part of the wedding ceremony.

relationships.description: Monsieur Delacour and Fleur are walking up the aisle together, indicating a close relationship between them.
Bill does not look like he has ever met Fenrir Greyback, implying they do not have a relationship.
Fleur's radiance beautifies Ginny and Gabrielle when it falls upon them, indicating Fleur has an effect on them.
Fleur reaches Bill at the end of the aisle, indicating they are together in this moment.
